Examples¶

Review your consent models, locator models and any other models that store personally identifying information. Replace the current field class with a bhp_crypto field class.

National Identity Number¶

For example, on a consent form the national identity number is documented in the field identity. bhp_crypto provides a field class for identity which is a subclass of RestrictedRsaEncryptionField and, as the class name suggests, employs RSA encryption using the restricted-rsa key pair. A RestrictedRsaEncryptionField does not require the private key to be available to the EDC for normal operation. This is a good choice for the identity number as once the identity number is captured there is usually no reason to decrypted it.

from django.db.models import CharField

class ConsentModel(BaseModel):
    ...

    identity = CharField(
        max_length=35,
        null=True,
        blank=True,
        )

would become:

from bhp_crypto.fields import EncryptedIdentityField

class ConsentModel(BaseModel):

    ...

    identity = EncryptedIdentityField(
        null=True,
        blank=True,
        )
